name: 100 PICS Mahjong
description:
Play Mahjong with pictures, logos, symbols and more!

Over 1000 levels! Over 200 picture categories to play with!

> Match pairs in the correct order to solve each puzzle
> Easy to play, hard to master!
> An ancient classic free game with a new picture twist

Play free mahjong solitaire puzzles with logos, flags, dogs, animals, symbols, fun photos and lots more!

> Easy to play just match 2!
> Can you spot the pairs?
> Tap a pair to remove them
> Tap in the right order to avoid getting trapped
> Can you solve every puzzle?
> Match pairs in the right order to win!

- Over 100 picture category packs
- Over 10,000 levels
- More Mahjong than ever!
- Play pairs with 100s of different photos
- Pic packs on symbols, logos, animals, dogs, cats and more!

> Never get stuck - use hints!
> Undo wrong moves
> Shuffle all mahjong tiles
> Auto pair! Select a tile and auto find the match, or auto play the next pair

100 PICS!
- The new game from 100 PICS and Poptacular
- Perfect for fans of 100 PICS Quiz, 100 PICS Puzzles, 100 PICS Word Search
- New picture packs every week of the year!
- Get one mahjong pack free every week!
- Get a brand new pack every week!
- Play forever!
